summary: The story of superhero Malice in his hometown of crime plagued Wonderland. The safety of the city is up to Malice who fights crime and strives to bring peace back to his neighborhood.
cast: Snoop Dogg|Denyce Lawton|Jamie Foxx|Hawthorne James|Xzibit|Michael Colyar|Reuben Cardona|Soulja Boy|Alexander Aguila|Rell Battle|Tomas Boykin|Diplo|DJ Quik|Jules Fleming|Mayer Hawthorne|Xango Henry|Nipsey Hussle|Jen Johnson|Christine Ly|Jillisa Lynn|Alexandra Merejo|Marguerite Nocera|Sara Schneider|Marina Steele|Paulie Tattoo|Diane Witter|Michele Larg√©
title: Malice N Wonderland
